title: How Many Calories in a PBJ Sandwich?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in pbj with a full nutrition breakdown for a standard peanut butter and jelly sandwich, including macros and tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a PBJ Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard PBJ: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, PB brand, jelly sweetness, portion sizes, and preparation. Check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A standard PBJ sandwich contains about 400 kcal, with 12 g protein and 18 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged items.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard PBJ?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.
Roughly 12 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Does PBJ have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 20 g total, primarily from jelly and bread.
